summary: The diff shows styling and frontend content changes (CSS theming, homepage updates, file summaries) but provides no evidence of deployment error diagnosis or resolution. The backend/main.mo was modified to an empty actor, which could worsen deployment issues rather than fix them. No deployment configuration, build scripts, error logs, or infrastructure changes are present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Diagnose and resolve the deployment error that occurred during the build and deploy sequence
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of deployment error diagnosis or resolution. Changes are limited to frontend styling, content updates, and CSS theming. No deployment configuration, error handling, build script modifications, or infrastructure fixes are present.

hallucinated_features.description: Extensive banana-themed visual design system including jungle parallax backgrounds, custom color schemes (OKLCH values), themed shadows, animations, and multi-environment game showcase
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is focused solely on fixing a deployment error with high priority. No requirements mention visual theming, game content, jungle environments, or UI redesign. These changes appear unrelated to deployment error resolution.

hallucinated_features.description: Game content and marketing copy describing 'Banana Split' gorilla exploration game with multiple maps, grabbable items, and environment showcases
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements mention game description, marketing content, or gameplay feature documentation. BuildRequest only asks to fix deployment errors.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor emptied to bare minimum code
hallucinated_features.reason: While modifying backend/main.mo, the change reduces it to an empty actor with no functionality. This could break existing functionality or deployment rather than fix deployment errors. No explanation or deployment-related logic present.
